…down with all new Members. Of  course, I wasn't just asking personally. I was asking because we had  four new Members of Congress from Michigan: Mr. Levin, Ms. Tlaib, Ms.  Slotkin, and myself. I thought it would be nice for all of us to maybe  meet with the Dingells.

It was winter, and we knew Mr. Dingell's health was failing or shaky.  It started…
